fetch_rows(sql) {|hash_row(sth)| ...}

[Source]

    # File lib/sequel/adapters/db2.rb, line 81
81:       def fetch_rows(sql)
82:         execute(sql) do |sth|
83:           @column_info = get_column_info(sth)
84:           @columns = @column_info.map {|c| output_identifier(c[:name])}
85:           while (rc = SQLFetch(@handle)) != SQL_NO_DATA_FOUND
86:             @db.check_error(rc, "Could not fetch row")
87:             yield hash_row(sth)
88:           end
89:         end
90:         self
91:       end
